<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scrollmaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1130) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 113 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Scrollmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=31)

**Prerequisites**
expert in any [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) skill; member of the Pathfinder Society affiliated with the School of Scrolls

**Access**
A character who is a member of the Pathfinder Society has access to this option.

</column>

---

Your experience chronicling adventures and discoveries grants you heightened discernment and memory. For 24 hours after learning a prominent fact—such as the name of an NPC you have met, the details of your mission briefing, and similar information—you can recall it without attempting a check, though this doesn’t allow you to automatically memorize long strings of numbers or text. You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to remember a detail that has come up before in the current adventure, even if it was more than 24 hours ago.

 If you have the [Thorough Reports](/Feats.aspx?ID=874) feat and have expert proficiency in the skill you’re using to Recall Knowledge, your circumstance bonus to Recall Knowledge about creatures from that feat increases to +4.

**Special** You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Scrollmaster archetype.

<title level="2">Scrollmaster Dedication leads to...</title>
[Bestiary Scholar](/Feats.aspx?ID=2236), [Cautious Delver](/Feats.aspx?ID=2237), [Font of Knowledge](/Feats.aspx?ID=1133), [Foolproof Instructions](/Feats.aspx?ID=2232), [Innate Magic Intuition](/Feats.aspx?ID=2233), [Lore Seeker](/Feats.aspx?ID=1131), [Magic Finder](/Feats.aspx?ID=2234), [Masterful Obfuscation](/Feats.aspx?ID=2238), [Transcribe Moment](/Feats.aspx?ID=2235), [Unravel Mysteries](/Feats.aspx?ID=1132), [Ward Mind](/Feats.aspx?ID=2240)
